name: Biofeaturefusion
body:
BioFeatureFusion
================

Feature Vector => Dimension Reduction => Classification => Prediction

Dimension Reduction
-------------------

- Our own implementation
- and those available in drtoolbox

Classification
--------------

- SVM
- Discriminant Analysis
- Classification Tree
- Regression Tree

Visualization
-------------

coming soon
